data.title: Last Minute Cottages
data.meta_description: Looking for late availability accomodation in the UK? Home to the biggest range at the lowest price, save when you book with Last Minute Cottages.
data.text:
Frequent questions

Why choose Last Minute Cottages?

With over 60,000 properties, we help you to complete your booking while giving you discounts, member-only prices and a best price guarantee.

What is Last Minute Cottage's best price guarantee?

We connect you to a range of great suppliers that have a huge selection of properties at the best prices. We never charge you more than you would pay to book directly on the supplier site and if you become a Last Minute Cottages member, you can save even more, which means you’ll always pay the lowest price with us.

How can I book a property?

With live prices and availability, all of our properties are bookable online. We connect you with the best professionally managed properties, and our marketing leading customer service team can help you every step of the way.

Can I book a short break?

Many of our owners allow short stay bookings of 2, 3 or 4 nights. Depending on the property, short stays are available either throughout the year, though in peak periods such as summer break duration can be more restrictive. Any search on our site only shows bookable properties.

Do you have properties with hot tubs?

Yes, we have over 15,000 properties across the UK with hot tubs that are instantly bookable online.

What time can I check-in and when am I required to depart?

Check-in would usually be between 3pm to 4pm and check-out is usually at 10am. This will be confirmed on your final booking though.

Are towels and linen provided?

Most property owners will provide linen and towels at no extra cost. This is usually noted on the property description, although if this isn’t stated then just get in contact with us to check.

What is your cancellation policy?

As we act as a marketplace advertising properties on behalf of property managers, this means the policy will change for each property manager. The cancellation cost can vary depending on the time of the cancellation.
